ngiemboon: Lejÿɔ́g shú náʼa ńdúŋo na mèŋ tɛʼ káa?
en: Your eyes are often focused on me, aren't they?
The road has dug up at the entrance to our house.

ngiemboon: Tsɔ̌ nyìŋ mesoŋ gẅie aa ndʉ̀alʉ̌a à tè tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó wɔ́.
en: There is no sinless man in the world.

ngiemboon: À tè pfɛ́ mmó ndʉm wɔ́.

en: people who are said to possess an inherited power to travel in their spirit and eat the internal organs of their enemies, causing them to get sick or die
